# pdf-node
  A JavaScript PDF generation library for NodeJs

<br>

[![ðŸ“Ÿ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ahmadawais/stuff/master/images/git/install.png)](./../../)

## Install

```sh
npm install  pdf-node --save
```
